basics.name: Ronald E. Straight
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Spending each day solving problems and building things with a great group of peers, and ending each day with more knowledge and wisdom than my yester-self.

work.name: Synacor
work.summary: Led conversion of the Zimbra platform to a Kubernetes-native, multi-tenant service using Golang and Oracle Cloud. Later joined legacy Java team and helped complete major migration of hundreds of millions of mailboxes.

work.name: Adblade / Solve Media
work.summary: Developed a RESTful DMP backend in Java/Netty serving Redis-stored user data for real-time ad targeting. Ported Ruby services to Java and migrated data centers to AWS.

work.name: Kanoodle
work.summary: Led Perl development on ad-serving systems, contributed to DBIx::Class, administered Oracle DBs, and managed deployments to 100+ servers using Bash and Puppet.

work.name: Netsville
work.summary: Built one of the first e-commerce systems in C with templating and plugin architecture. Startup founded with fellow hackers in the early days of the web.
